name: Broken Layers - Side Story #2: Pyotr's Diary
name_original: Broken Layers - Side Story #2: Pyotr's Diary
description:
His therapist and his wife advise him to write before he forgets;

Pyotr is trying to before he leaves one last time.

CLICK to play in fullscreen.
